verses.verse: And an angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> Gilgal <S%H1537><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Bochim, <S%H1066><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> I made you to go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H853><s%> out of Egypt, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%> and have brought <S%H935><s%> you unto <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I swore <S%H7650><s%> unto your fathers; <S%H1><s%> and I said, <S%H559><s%> I will never <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5769><s%> break <S%H6565><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with <S%H854><s%> you.

And ye <S%H859><s%> shall make <S%H3772><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> league <S%H1285><s%> with the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of this <S%H2063><s%> land; <S%H776><s%> ye shall throw down <S%H5422><s%> their altars: <S%H4196><s%> but ye have not <S%H3808><s%> obeyed <S%H8085><s%> my voice: <S%H6963><s%> why <S%H4100><s%> have ye done <S%H6213><s%> this? <S%H2063><s%>

Wherefore I also <S%H1571><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> I will not <S%H3808><s%> drive them out <S%H1644><s%> <S%H853><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you; but they shall be <S%H1961><s%> as thorns in your sides, <S%H6654><s%> and their gods <S%H430><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> a snare <S%H4170><s%> unto you.

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> <S%H853><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that the people <S%H5971><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> their voice, <S%H6963><s%> and wept. <S%H1058><s%>
And they called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of that <S%H1931><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> Bochim: <S%H1066><s%> and they sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And when Joshua <S%H3091><s%> had let <S%H853><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> unto his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>

And the people <S%H5971><s%> served <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> that <S%H834><s%> outlived <S%H748><s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H310><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> who <S%H834><s%> had seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> works <S%H4639><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he did <S%H6213><s%> for Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> being a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old. <S%H1121><s%>

And they buried <S%H6912><s%> him in the border <S%H1366><s%> of his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> in Timnath-heres, <S%H8556><s%> in the mount <S%H2022><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> on the north side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6828><s%> of the hill <S%H2022><s%> Gaash. <S%H1608><s%>

And also <S%H1571><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%> were gathered <S%H622><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> their fathers: <S%H1><s%> and there arose <S%H6965><s%> another <S%H312><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them, which <S%H834><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> nor yet <S%H1571><s%> <S%H853><s%> the works <S%H4639><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he had done <S%H6213><s%> for Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and served <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> Baalim: <S%H1168><s%>

And they forsook <S%H5800><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> which brought them out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and followed <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> of the gods <S%H4480><s%> <S%H430><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were round about <S%H5439><s%> them, and bowed themselves <S%H7812><s%> unto them, and provoked <S%H3707><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to anger. <S%H3707><s%>
And they forsook <S%H5800><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and served <S%H5647><s%> Baal <S%H1168><s%> and Ashtaroth. <S%H6252><s%>

And the anger <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was hot <S%H2734><s%> against Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and he delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of spoilers <S%H8154><s%> that spoiled <S%H8155><s%> them, and he sold <S%H4376><s%> them into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%> round about, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5439><s%> so that they could <S%H3201><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> any longer <S%H5750><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> their enemies. <S%H341><s%>

Whithersoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> they went out, <S%H3318><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> against them for evil, <S%H7451><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had said, <S%H1696><s%> and as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had sworn <S%H7650><s%> unto them: and they were greatly <S%H3966><s%> distressed. <S%H3334><s%>

Nevertheless the LORD <S%H3068><s%> raised up <S%H6965><s%> judges, <S%H8199><s%> which delivered <S%H3467><s%> them out of the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of those that spoiled <S%H8154><s%> them.

And yet <S%H1571><s%> they would not <S%H3808><s%> hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> their judges, <S%H8199><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> they went a whoring <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> and bowed themselves <S%H7812><s%> unto them: they turned <S%H5493><s%> quickly <S%H4118><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> which <S%H834><s%> their fathers <S%H1><s%> walked <S%H1980><s%> in, obeying <S%H8085><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> but they did <S%H6213><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> so. <S%H3651><s%>

And when <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> raised them up <S%H6965><s%> judges, <S%H8199><s%> then the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> the judge, <S%H8199><s%> and delivered <S%H3467><s%> them out of the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of the judge: <S%H8199><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> it repented <S%H5162><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> because of their groanings <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5009><s%> by reason of them <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> that oppressed <S%H3905><s%> them and vexed <S%H1766><s%> them.

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when the judge <S%H8199><s%> was dead, <S%H4191><s%> that they returned, <S%H7725><s%> and corrupted <S%H7843><s%> themselves more than their fathers, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1><s%> in following <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> them, and to bow down <S%H7812><s%> unto them; they ceased <S%H5307><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> from their own doings, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4611><s%> nor from their stubborn way. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1870><s%> <S%H7186><s%>

And the anger <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was hot <S%H2734><s%> against Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and he said, <S%H559><s%> Because <S%H3282><s%> that <S%H834><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H1471><s%> hath transgressed <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> their fathers, <S%H1><s%> and have not <S%H3808><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> unto my voice; <S%H6963><s%>

I <S%H589><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> will not <S%H3808><s%> henceforth <S%H3254><s%> drive out <S%H3423><s%> any <S%H376><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> them of <S%H4480><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> left <S%H5800><s%> when he died: <S%H4191><s%>

That <S%H4616><s%> through them I may prove <S%H5254><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> whether they <S%H1992><s%> will keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to walk <S%H1980><s%> therein, as <S%H834><s%> their fathers <S%H1><s%> did keep <S%H8104><s%> it, or <S%H518><s%> not. <S%H3808><s%>

Therefore the LORD <S%H3068><s%> left <S%H5117><s%> <S%H853><s%> those <S%H428><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> without <S%H1115><s%> driving them out <S%H3423><s%> hastily; <S%H4118><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> he them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Joshua. <S%H3091><s%>
